name: gatsby-transformer-screenshot
description: Gatsby transformer plugin that uses AWS Lambda to take screenshots of websites

scripts.lambda-package: npm run lambda-package-prepare && cp chrome/headless_shell.tar.gz lambda && cd lambda && zip -rq ../lambda-package.zip .
scripts.lambda-package-prepare: npm run build && cp lambda-package.json lambda/package.json && cd lambda && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=1 npm install --production

author: David Beckley <beckl.ds@gmail.com>
